movies.title: Deewana
movies.description: A young woman marries a singer, but after his sudden death, she struggles to overcome her grief until she meets a man who changes her life.

reviews.comment: A classic debut by Shah Rukh Khan!

awards: Filmfare Award for Best Male Debut

movies.title: Chamatkar
movies.description: A man finds himself in trouble until he encounters the ghost of a gangster who helps him win over his love.

reviews.comment: Unique blend of comedy and fantasy.

movies.title: Raju Ban Gaya Gentleman
movies.description: A small-town man with big dreams moves to the city and gets entangled in a love triangle while trying to succeed.

reviews.comment: A feel-good film with a lot of heart!

movies.title: Dil Aashna Hai
movies.description: A dancer discovers her mother’s identity after being abandoned as a child and sets out on a journey to reunite with her.

reviews.comment: An emotional story with strong performances.

movies.title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
movies.description: A boy with simple dreams faces numerous ups and downs in love and life but remains hopeful and determined.

reviews.comment: SRK’s best romantic comedy.

awards: Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actor

movies.title: King Uncle
movies.description: A rich, stern man’s life changes when he adopts an orphan girl and learns about the value of family.

reviews.comment: A heartwarming family story with great performances.

movies.title: Baazigar
movies.description: A man takes revenge on a business tycoon by targeting his daughters.

reviews.comment: One of SRK's best performances as an anti-hero.

movies.title: Darr
movies.description: A young man becomes dangerously obsessed with a woman engaged to someone else.

reviews.comment: Shah Rukh Khan excels in his portrayal of obsession.

movies.title: Anjaam
movies.description: A man's unrequited love for a woman leads to a path of revenge and destruction.

reviews.comment: Shah Rukh Khan's intensity is unmatched in this film.

movies.title: Karan Arjun
movies.description: Two brothers are murdered and reincarnated to take revenge on their enemies.

reviews.comment: An iconic film with a unique storyline!

movies.title: Zamaana Deewana
movies.description: A police officer tries to unite two families in order to solve the crime problem in the city.

reviews.comment: An entertaining mix of comedy and drama.

movies.title: Guddu
movies.description: A young man faces a moral dilemma after an accident leaves his girlfriend blind.

reviews.comment: A tragic tale of love and sacrifice.

movies.title: Oh Darling! Yeh Hai India!
movies.description: A young man and a woman journey through the city to stop a sinister plot.

reviews.comment: An unconventional story with quirky humor.

movies.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
movies.description: Raj and Simran fall in love while traveling through Europe but must overcome family opposition to be together.

reviews.comment: A timeless classic that redefined Bollywood romance.

movies.title: English Babu Desi Mem
movies.description: A wealthy Indian man living in London returns to India and falls in love with a local woman.

reviews.comment: A lighthearted film with a fun storyline.

movies.title: Chaahat
movies.description: A singer falls in love but must confront a powerful businessman to be with the woman he loves.

reviews.comment: A moving performance by Shah Rukh Khan.

movies.title: Army
movies.description: A woman seeks revenge on her husband's killers by forming her own army.

reviews.comment: An intense action-packed story.

movies.title: Koyla
movies.description: A mute man seeks revenge on a ruthless businessman for trapping him in a life of servitude.

reviews.comment: Intense story with great performances.

movies.title: Yes Boss
movies.description: A man helps his boss with romantic affairs, only to fall for the same woman.

reviews.comment: A classic SRK-Juhi romance with humor.

awards: Filmfare Award for Best Playback Singer (Female)

movies.title: Pardes
movies.description: A man from India falls in love with a girl set to marry an NRI.

reviews.comment: Emotionally touching with great performances.

awards: Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut

movies.title: Dil To Pagal Hai
movies.description: A musical love triangle involving a theater director and two of his dancers.

reviews.comment: Amazing songs and dance sequences!

awards: National Film Award for Best Popular Film

movies.title: Duplicate
movies.description: A comedy of errors involving a chef mistaken for a criminal.

reviews.comment: Hilarious with Shah Rukh Khan's double role.

movies.title: Achanak
movies.description: A former soldier struggles with the trauma of his past actions.

reviews.comment: A poignant story with powerful performances.

movies.title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
movies.description: A college love triangle reunites years later through a child’s wish.

reviews.comment: A timeless classic with iconic performances.

movies.title: Baadshah
movies.description: A private detective gets entangled in a web of crime and corruption.

reviews.comment: A fun mix of action and comedy.

movies.title: Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani
movies.description: Two rival news reporters unite to uncover a political scandal.

reviews.comment: Funny with a serious message about media ethics.

movies.title: Hey Ram
movies.description: A story set during the partition of India, exploring themes of revenge and redemption.

reviews.comment: A gripping historical drama with strong performances.

awards: National Film Award for Best Special Effects

movies.title: Josh
movies.description: Two rival street gangs clash over love and friendship in a small town.

reviews.comment: Exciting gang rivalry with a dash of romance.

movies.title: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega
movies.description: A love triangle ensues when a man pretends to be the fiancé of a woman in a coma.

reviews.comment: A lighthearted romantic comedy with memorable performances.

movies.title: Mohabbatein
movies.description: An inspiring teacher brings love and joy to a strict school, challenging its rigid norms.

reviews.comment: A heartwarming story of love and defiance.

awards: Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actor

movies.title: Gaja Gamini
movies.description: A surreal tale that explores the feminine mystique and celebrates the essence of womanhood.

reviews.comment: A visually enchanting experience, though unconventional.

movies.title: One 2 Ka 4
movies.description: A police officer teams up with his friend's children to take down a ruthless drug lord.

reviews.comment: Entertaining with solid performances, especially from SRK and Jackie.

movies.title: Aśoka
movies.description: A historical drama that traces the life of Emperor Ashoka and his transformation from a ruthless king to a Buddhist.

reviews.comment: A captivating portrayal of a legendary figure.

awards: Filmfare Award for Best Art Direction

movies.title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
movies.description: A story of a wealthy family torn apart by the different paths their sons choose to follow.

reviews.comment: An emotional family drama with timeless music.

movies.title: Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam
movies.description: A man's insecurities and misunderstandings strain his marriage with his wife.

reviews.comment: A dramatic love triangle with powerful performances.

movies.title: Devdas
movies.description: The tragic love story of Devdas, a wealthy man who is unable to marry his childhood love.

reviews.comment: A visually stunning and emotional journey.

awards: National Film Award for Best Popular Film

movies.title: Shakti: The Power
movies.description: A woman must face brutal challenges to protect her son in a rural area controlled by a violent leader.

reviews.comment: A powerful performance by Karishma Kapoor, with a cameo from SRK.

movies.title: Saathiya
movies.description: A young couple elopes, but the struggles of married life soon take their toll.

reviews.comment: A touching story with memorable music.

movies.title: Chalte Chalte
movies.description: A couple navigates the complexities of love and misunderstandings in their relationship.

reviews.comment: A sweet story with charming performances.

movies.title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
movies.description: A terminally ill man tries to bring happiness to the lives of those around him.

reviews.comment: An emotional rollercoaster with a beautiful message.

movies.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
movies.description: A story of love, loss, and the sacrifices made for relationships.

reviews.comment: A melodramatic take on love, though somewhat predictable.

movies.title: Main Hoon Na
movies.description: An army major goes undercover as a student to protect a general's daughter.

reviews.comment: A fun mix of action, comedy, and romance!

awards: Filmfare Award for Best Male Playback Singer

movies.title: Veer-Zaara
movies.description: A love story between an Indian man and a Pakistani woman, spanning several years and obstacles.

reviews.comment: A beautifully told story with stunning performances.

movies.title: Swades
movies.description: An NRI returns to India to find his childhood nanny and discovers his roots.

reviews.comment: A thought-provoking film with a strong message about social responsibility.

movies.title: Kuchh Meetha Ho Jaye
movies.description: A romantic comedy that explores love and relationships through the lives of its characters.

reviews.comment: A light-hearted film with moments of fun and laughter.

movies.title: Bunty Aur Babli
movies.description: A young couple sets out on a life of crime and adventure as they impersonate famous personalities.

reviews.comment: A fun-filled caper with great chemistry between the leads.

movies.title: Paheli
movies.description: A magical story of a ghost who falls in love with a newly married woman.

reviews.comment: A unique take on love and magic, beautifully shot.

awards: Filmfare Award for Best Art Direction

movies.title: Mangal Pandey: The Rising
movies.description: The story of Mangal Pandey, a soldier who played a crucial role in the Indian Rebellion of 1857.

reviews.comment: A gripping tale of resistance and sacrifice.

movies.title: Don
movies.description: A remake of the 1978 classic, it follows the story of a notorious gangster and the cop who tries to capture him.

reviews.comment: High-octane thrills with a captivating performance by SRK.

movies.title: I See You
movies.description: A thrilling drama that explores the complexities of relationships and the psychological depths of its characters.

reviews.comment: A gripping narrative with unexpected twists.

movies.title: Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna
movies.description: A complex tale of love and relationships that challenges the norms of marriage and fidelity.

reviews.comment: An emotional rollercoaster with strong performances.

movies.title: Baabul
movies.description: A heartfelt story of family values and the importance of relationships in the face of tragedy.

reviews.comment: A touching narrative that highlights the power of love and loss.

movies.title: Chak De! India
movies.description: A former hockey player coaches the Indian women's national team, facing challenges and prejudices along the way.

reviews.comment: An inspiring story of perseverance and teamwork.

awards: National Film Award for Best Popular Film

movies.title: Om Shanti Om
movies.description: A film about reincarnation, where a junior artist in the 1970s comes back to life to seek revenge on his murderer.

reviews.comment: A vibrant celebration of Bollywood with great music and visuals.

movies.title: Dulha Mil Gaya
movies.description: A romantic comedy about a wedding planner who gets entangled in a love story with a twist.

reviews.comment: A light-hearted movie but fails to make a strong impact.

movies.title: My Name Is Khan
movies.description: A man with Asperger's syndrome embarks on a journey to meet the President of the United States to clear his name.

reviews.comment: An emotional and powerful narrative that challenges societal norms.

movies.title: Ra.One
movies.description: A video game designer creates a game that brings its villain to life, leading to chaos.

reviews.comment: Visually impressive but the story lacks depth.

movies.title: Don 2
movies.description: The story follows Don, who has successfully established himself as the king of the underworld in Asia. Now, he aims to expand his empire to Europe while being pursued by law enforcement.

reviews.comment: A thrilling sequel with stunning visuals and an engaging plot.

movies.title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
movies.description: A love story that revolves around a bomb disposal expert who confronts his past and realizes the true meaning of love.

reviews.comment: A beautiful film with heartfelt performances and timeless music.

movies.title: Chennai Express
movies.description: A man travels to South India on a journey of self-discovery, encountering a series of comical adventures and falling in love along the way.

reviews.comment: A fun-filled ride with great chemistry between the leads and lots of laughs.

movies.title: Happy New Year
movies.description: A group of dancers embarks on a mission to pull off a massive heist during a dance competition in Dubai, all while seeking revenge against a powerful businessman.

reviews.comment: An entertaining mix of comedy and action, with some great dance sequences.

movies.title: Dilwale
movies.description: The story follows two rival families, and how love prevails over family feuds when the children from each family fall in love.

reviews.comment: A fun and colorful film with a great cast, although the story felt predictable.

movies.title: Fan
movies.description: The story revolves around a fan who stalks his idol, leading to a series of dramatic events as he struggles with his obsession.

reviews.comment: A gripping tale of obsession with an outstanding performance by SRK.

movies.title: Dear Zindagi
movies.description: A young cinematographer struggles with her personal and professional life and seeks the help of an unorthodox therapist.

reviews.comment: A beautifully crafted film that explores mental health in a refreshing way.

movies.title: Raees
movies.description: Set in the 1980s, Raees is a story about a bootlegger who rises to power but has to face challenges from a police officer.

reviews.comment: Shah Rukh Khan delivers a powerful performance in a gripping story.

movies.title: Jab Harry Met Sejal
movies.description: A romantic comedy about a couple who travel together across Europe, looking for a lost engagement ring and discovering love along the way.

reviews.comment: A light-hearted film with charming performances, but lacks depth.

movies.title: Zero
movies.description: A story about a dwarf man who falls in love with a famous actress and navigates his complex relationships.

reviews.comment: An ambitious film with a unique concept and strong performances.

movies.title: Badla
movies.description: A lawyer helps a young woman accused of murdering her lover, but things are not as straightforward as they seem.

reviews.comment: A gripping thriller with unexpected twists.

movies.title: Dil Bechara
movies.description: A poignant love story between two cancer patients who find solace in each other's company.

reviews.comment: A touching story that beautifully portrays love and loss.

movies.title: Pathaan
movies.description: A spy thriller where an exiled RAW agent is called back to action to stop a deadly attack on India.

reviews.comment: A high-octane action film with stunning visuals and a gripping plot.
